## The Upside-Down Kingdom Blog

In a world where success is defined by power, prestige, and self-promotion, The Upside-Down Kingdom, and this blog, invites you to discover the freedom and joy found in surrendering to the paradoxical ways of Jesus. I pray for you to gain insight and enlightenment throughout these seemly contradictory, but ordered statements and graphics.
